node.title: Purposed in His Heart
node.description: The decisions we make affect not only us, but the lives of those around us through the power of 'peer influence.' As we live a life in response to God's call, we are often faced with challenges in which we must make a choice to compromise, or to stand for God. This is the true story of a young doctor's journey to Adventist truth through the faithfulness of a colleague who purposed to stand for God.
